item.title: 使用hugo的jane主题时，categories 书写不规范
item.description: categories 不是列表 ➜ tomtsang-rootsongjc-hugo git:(master) ✗ hugo server Building sites … ERROR 2018/11/26 01:07:40 Error while rendering "page" in "posts/": template: _default/single.html:11:5: executing "_default/single.html" at <partial "head.html" ...>: error calling partial: template: partials/head.html:28:16: executing "partials/head.html" at <index ($.Site.Data.a...>: error calling index: value has type []string; should be string ERROR 2018/11/26 01:07:40 Error while rendering "page" in "post/": template: post/single.html:14:21: executing "content" at <.>: range can't iterate over cloud-native ERROR 2018/11/26 01:07:40 in .
